item.title: Warhammer illustration
item.description:
In this work I was inspired by the book “Brutal Kunnin” by Mike Brooks

#warhammer40k #warhammer #warhammerart #warhammercommunity #wh40k #40k #brushray #artbrushray #orks #adeptusmechanicus #mechanicus

Like my work? Feel free to contact me ✉ for your personalized piece of art anytime!

item.title: Gul’dan – an orc warlock
item.description:
Hi everyone!

I want to show you my new Warcraft fan art and to tell a small story behind it.

My love to computer games started with Starcraft. Later then when I discovered digital art, Starcraft and Warcraft were among the major sources of inspiration

Needless to say I raved about the idea of making art for the Blizzard… many did. But man, how good one have to be to work with them. It was too much and too big for one small enthusiast who haven’t even seen an art school.
